thread.title: Tom Hurley
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Tom Hurley

author: Tom Hurley
title: Tom Hurley
text: We hand an excellent time while on our honeymoon in Costa Rica. Costa Rican Vacations helped us set up the perfect trip. We were very picky about what we wanted and Felicia Clark helped us the whole way and made sure everything went smoothly. We would highly recommend this company and specifically Felicia to anyone planning to trave to Costa Rica.
